basics.name: Business Development Manager
basics.label: Manager
basics.summary: Accomplished top performing professional with proven success in directing, leading and managing projects and campaigns from concept through completion. Intensely focused on partnering to ensure client/customer satisfaction consistently exceeds expectations. Creative, strong partnership building skills and excellent communicator recognized for taking a collaborative approach and an enthusiastic team player.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Beta Coordinator for Project Rubicon. Shopper-Ready Content and Tools for Omni-Channel Digital Marketing.
highlights: Successfully manage all Rubicon retail customer meetings. Help drive interest in project with local retailers based in the Seattle area. Result: Built a loyal customer list.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Operated in the fast-paced Online Advertising division with a focus on the Detroit, MI territory. AOL, (S&P 400), is a pioneer and leading-edge global web services company.
highlights: Implemented critical analysis and identified campaigns that were not running. RESULT: Saved campaigns from showing $0 profit, effecting bottom line results.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Managed corporate training projects aimed for sales effectiveness.
highlights: Teamed with sales force to create and deploy 'Template of Excellence', a diagnostic sales assessment tool with patent pending. RESULT: Provided a tool that would pinpoint individual strengths and weaknesses and identify critical gaps across a sales force.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Marketed fine fragrance products for this high-end perfumery house and managed a team of 20, across three states and 65 stores. BPI USA is a subsidiary of the Paris-based BPI and is a division of the Shiseido Americas Corporation.
highlights: Successfully built a selling team, motivating and implementing solid sales techniques. RESULT: Earned the #1 ranking in the region.

skills.name: Sales and Business Development
keywords: comprehensive large array data stewardship system
